data.label: Creation Stories
data.description: Two different creation accounts in Genesis
theological_differences: Creation order (cosmos first vs humans first)

data.label: Source J
data.description: Jahwist - Early narrative source with anthropomorphic God

data.label: Wife-Sister Motif
data.description: Three accounts of patriarch presenting wife as sister
theological_differences: Divine intervention method (plagues vs dreams vs observation)
Resolution outcome (expulsion vs gifts vs prosperity)

data.label: Source E
data.description: Elohist - Northern source emphasizing divine communication

data.label: Moses' Divine Commission
theological_differences: Divine name usage (Yahweh vs Elohim vs El Shaddai)
Signs emphasis (immediate vs detailed vs genealogical)
Helper provision (none vs Aaron vs Levitical priesthood)

data.label: Divine calling of leaders and prophets
data.description: Divine calling of leaders and prophets

data.label: Ten Commandments
theological_differences: Context (first giving vs renewal vs deuteronomic)

data.label: Water from Rock
data.description: Two accounts of Moses bringing water from rock
theological_differences: Consequence (none vs exclusion from promised land)

data.label: Manna and Quail Provision
data.description: Two accounts of wilderness food provision
